#create_ai_tool_modal .modal-close,#non_available_version_modal .modal-close{width:36px;height:36px;top:16px;right:16px;}#create_ai_tool_modal .modal-body{flex-direction:column;height:auto;}#create_ai_tool_modal .option-1{border-right:none;border-bottom:1px solid var(--color-medium-6);}#create_ai_tool_modal .option-card{padding:20px 16px;min-height:auto;}#create_ai_tool_modal .option-title{font-size:1.1rem;margin-bottom:14px;}#create_ai_tool_modal .mini-tool-container{margin-bottom:14px;}#create_ai_tool_modal .mini-tool-icon{width:auto;max-width:280px;height:auto;max-height:90px;}#create_ai_tool_modal .option-description{font-size:0.875rem;margin-bottom:16px;max-width:100%;}#create_ai_tool_modal .option-button{padding:11px 0;font-size:0.875rem;}}@media (max-width:500px){#create_ai_tool_modal .modal-container{border-radius:8px;max-height:100vh;}#create_ai_tool_modal .modal-header{padding:12px 16px;}#create_ai_tool_modal .modal-title{font-size:1rem;}

#create_ai_tool_modal .option-2 .option-button:hover{background:#55c97f;}#create_ai_tool_modal .option-1 .option-button:hover{background:#125a8a;}}@media (max-width:500px){body.safari #mobile_menu{bottom:4px;}body.safari.shift #main > .filters{top:calc(env(safe-area-inset-top) + var(--ctrl-height) + 50px);}}.admin_menu .scheduled_date{color:var(--color-yellow);pointer-events:none;background-color:var(--color-dark);border-radius:50px;line-height:32px;padding:4px 20px;}.admin_menu.transparent_tabs{pointer-events:all;}a.tab.submit.ai-tool svg{pointer-events:none;}#menu .menu_inner{display:flex;height:100%;padding-bottom:10px;}#menu .menu_inner > *{flex-shrink:0;flex-grow:0;}#menu .menu_item.submit.ai-tool{margin-top:auto;}#menu #switch_create_tool_menu svg{background:var(--color-verified);color:var(--color-white);fill:var(--color-white);padding:4px;animation:rotateAnimation 10s linear infinite;transition:transform 0.3s ease;}

.li.m.company_model .ai_link .generation_badge{flex:0 0 auto;width:auto;padding:3px 10px;margin-left:0;border-radius:var(--border-radius-large);background:var(--color-body);border:1px solid var(--border-dark-blue);color:var(--color-medium-4);font-size:11px;font-weight:500;opacity:0.8;}.li.m.company_model .short_desc{margin-bottom:0;min-height:60px;line-height:1.6;}.li.m.company_model .available_starting{position:absolute;bottom:14px;left:0;right:0;padding-left:15px;padding-right:15px;margin-left:0;display:flex !important;flex-direction:row !important;justify-content:space-between !important;align-items:center !important;gap:10px;min-height:auto !important;height:auto !important;}.li.m .available_starting .availability_badge{display:inline-block !important;width:auto;padding:4px 12px;margin:0;margin-right:8px;border-radius:var(--border-radius-large);border:1px solid var(--border-dark-blue);color:var(--color-light);font-size:13px;font-weight:600;letter-spacing:0.2px;flex-shrink:0;}
.availability_badge.availability_100{background:rgba(34,197,94,0.14);border-color:rgba(34,197,94,0.30);color:#baf7cf;}.availability_badge.availability_1{background:rgba(168,85,247,0.16);border-color:rgba(168,85,247,0.32);color:#edd3ff;}.availability_badge.availability_2{background:rgba(59,130,246,0.16);border-color:rgba(59,130,246,0.32);color:#cfe3ff;border-radius:var(--border-radius-large);}.availability_badge.availability_3{background:rgba(20,184,166,0.16);border-color:rgba(20,184,166,0.32);color:#c9fff7;}.availability_badge.availability_4{background:rgba(245,158,11,0.16);border-color:rgba(245,158,11,0.34);color:#ffe1b4;}.availability_badge.availability_5{background:rgba(236,72,153,0.15);border-color:rgba(236,72,153,0.32);color:#ffd2ea;}

<script type="text/javascript" src="https://plausible.io/js/script.tagged-events.js" async="" data-domain="theresanaiforthat.com"></script><style>
        .js-tutorial-modal-overlay {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100vh;
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
            backdrop-filter: blur(5px);
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            z-index: 9998;
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity 0.3s ease-in-out;
        }
        
        .js-tutorial-modal-overlay.show {
            opacity: 1;
        }
        
        .js-tutorial-modal {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #1a2a4d 0%, #2e3440 100%);
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 50px 40px 40px;
            max-width: 500px;
            width: 90%;
            position: relative;
            box-shadow: 0 20px 60px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
            transform: scale(0.9);
            transition: transform 0.3s ease-in-out;
        }
        
        .js-tutorial-modal-overlay.show .js-tutorial-modal {
            transform: scale(1);
        }
        
        .js-tutorial-modal-close {
            position: absolute;
            top: 20px;
            right: 20px;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
            width: 40px;
            height: 40px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            padding: 0;
        }
        
        .js-tutorial-modal-close:hover {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
            transform: rotate(90deg);
        }
        
        .js-tutorial-modal-close svg {
            width: 20px;
            height: 20px;
            color: white;
        }
        
        .js-tutorial-modal-content {
            text-align: center;
            color: white;
        }
        
        .js-tutorial-modal-icon {
            width: 80px;
            height: 80px;
            margin: 0 auto 30px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #2b3d63 0%, #0b1c3b 100%);
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgb(43 63 108);
            border: 1px solid #3d4d6f;
        }
        
        .js-tutorial-modal-icon img {
            width: 40px;
            height: 40px;
        }
        
        .js-tutorial-modal-title {
            font-size: 2.2rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Arial, sans-serif;
            text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
        }
        
        .js-tutorial-modal-text {
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            line-height: 1.6;
            margin-bottom: 35px;
            color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
            font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Arial, sans-serif;
        }
        
        .js-tutorial-modal-btn {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b6b 0%, #ee5656 100%);
            color: white;
            border: none;
            padding: 18px 50px;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            border-radius: 50px;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            box-shadow: 0 5px 20px rgba(238, 86, 86, 0.4);
            font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Arial, sans-serif;
        }
        
        .js-tutorial-modal-btn:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            background: #ff6b6b;
            box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(238, 86, 86, 0.5);
        }
        
        .js-tutorial-modal-btn:active {
            transform: translateY(0);
        }
        
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .js-tutorial-modal {
                padding: 40px 30px 30px;
            }
            
            .js-tutorial-modal-title {
                font-size: 1.8rem;
            }
            
            .js-tutorial-modal-text {
                font-size: 1rem;
                margin-bottom: 25px;
            }
            
            .js-tutorial-modal-btn {
                padding: 15px 40px;
                font-size: 1.1rem;
            }
            
            .js-tutorial-modal-icon {
                width: 60px;
                height: 60px;
                margin-bottom: 20px;
            }
            
            .js-tutorial-modal-icon svg {
                width: 30px;
                height: 30px;
            }
        }

        <div class="changelog_body" data-clk="">Your customers ask ChatGPT, Claude, and Gemini before they ever Google you. But do you know what those AI platforms actually say about your brand?

We run 50 real buyer prompts across four AI platforms and show you exactly where you appear, what gets said, whether it's accurate, and what your competitors look like in comparison.

One report. No subscription. Results in 24 hours.

What you get:

- Visibility scores across ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini & Perplexity
- Accuracy check: are the AI responses about you even true?
- Competitive breakdow: who AI recommends instead of you
- Content gaps: what to publish so AI starts citing you
- Technical audit: schema, crawlability, entity signals

Three tiers: Snapshot ($299), Professional ($990), Enterprise ($2,490).

→ loamly.ai/audit</div>

        <div class="changelog_body" data-clk="">Introducing Lindy Assistant:

It reads your email, drafts replies in your voice, manages your calendar, preps you before every meeting, takes notes during, and handles the follow-ups after. Not just words: real action that saves you time and buys you peace of mind, day in, day out.


What Lindy Assistant does for you:

There is an immense difference between a chatbot that can give answers and an AI assistant that knows you and proactively moves work forward:

- Your inbox is under control before your coffee. Lindy triages what matters, drafts replies that sound like you, and flags only what needs you. You review, and you send. You may have the same experience as many Lindy users, who start off by thinking that they are the ones who wrote these drafts — because they're that good.
- You walk into every meeting prepared. Lindy pulls context from past emails, previous meetings, and your calendar so you know who you're talking to, what was discussed, and what's at stake. No more scrambling five minutes before a call.
- Meetings end, work keeps moving. Notes captured, action items identified, follow-up emails drafted and ready to send. What used to slip through the cracks now happens automatically.
- Scheduling just stops being a thing you do. No more back-and-forth. Lindy handles availability, time zones, and preferences. Meetings land on your calendar without you touching it.
- Nothing falls through the cracks. Every conversation and commitment is recalled instantly. Ask Lindy what you discussed with a client three weeks ago and get the answer in seconds.


Proactive and personalized:

Lindy constantly works its magic in the background.

It learns how you write, how you prioritize, and what your day looks like — then starts anticipating what you need before you ask. Drafts get better. Prep gets more relevant. Follow-ups stop slipping.

The more you use it, the less you have to.


Enterprise-ready security:

Lindy is built for teams. SOC 2 Type II, GDPR, HIPAA, and PIPEDA compliant. You control what connects, what Lindy can access, and all data stays encrypted. No trade-off between getting time back and keeping things secure.


Get started in two minutes:

Connect your inbox. Let Lindy triage what needs attention and draft your replies. Then ask it to prep you for your next meeting.
‍
Within a day, you'll wonder how you worked without it.

Lindy Assistant is live now. Try it at Lindy.ai.</div>
    </div>

        <div class="changelog_body" data-clk="">NextDocs v1.6.0 - Brand Kit

Released: February 2026

Your brand identity, built into every content.

Brand Kit lets you define your brand once and have AI apply it to every document, presentation, and report you create. Colors, fonts, logos, tone of voice. All consistent. All automatic.

Describe what you need.
AI applies your brand.
You get on-brand results.

---

Brand Kit

Define your brand identity in one place. AI uses it every time you create.

A Brand Kit includes:
	- Theme: your colors, fonts, and visual style
	- Logos and images: company logos, product photos, hero images
	- Icons: brand-specific icons and graphics
	- AI instructions: tone of voice, writing style, terminology

Select your Brand Kit before generating. AI handles the rest.

---

Asset Usage Modes

Control how AI uses your brand assets.

Always
AI must include this asset in every document. Perfect for your company logo.

Maybe
AI can use this asset when it fits the content. Good for product screenshots or team photos.

Never
Asset is stored in your brand but AI will not use it automatically.

---

AI Instructions

Write custom instructions that guide AI on how to write for your brand:

"Use a professional but approachable tone. Avoid jargon. Always refer to our product as Acme Platform. End presentations with our tagline."

These instructions apply to every document created with this Brand Kit.

---

Use Cases

Sales Teams
Every proposal and pitch deck uses the same brand. No rogue presentations with the wrong logo.

Marketing Teams
Campaign decks and reports all follow brand guidelines without manual effort.

Agencies
Create separate Brand Kits for each client. Switch in one click.

Founders
Define your brand once. Every investor deck and internal doc is consistent.

---

New AI Models

Claude Opus 4.6 and Claude Sonnet 4.6 from Anthropic are now available for Pro users.

5 new free models added:
	- Kimi K2.5 from Moonshot AI
	- MiniMax M2.1
	- GLM 4.7 from Zhipu AI
	- DeepSeek V3.2
	- DeepSeek V3.2 Thinking (reasoning model)

All free models available to every user. No upgrade required.

---

Also in v1.6

Mobile Editing
New floating selection toolbar, multi-select mode, inline text editing, and mobile color picker.

80+ New Themes
Professionally designed themes across corporate, dark tech, creative, gradient, serif, and more.

Improved Exports
More reliable PDF, Google Slides, and PowerPoint exports with better image handling.

---

How It Works
	1.	Go to Brand Kit and create a new brand
	2.	Pick a theme, upload assets, write AI instructions
	3.	Select your brand when creating a document
	4.	AI applies your identity automatically
	5.	Get an on-brand document every time

Same simple workflow.
Now with your brand built in.

---

Try Brand Kit

Go to nextdocs.io.
Create a Brand Kit.
Generate a document.

Set your brand once. Let AI handle the rest.

- The NextDocs Team</div>

        <div class="changelog_body" data-clk="">Averi v4.0 — The AI Content Engine for Startups

One Workflow. Strategy to Published. Built for Lean Teams.

We rebuilt Averi from the ground up around a single idea: startups shouldn't need a 5-person marketing team to build real content-driven growth.

Averi v4.0 is the AI Content Engine — a complete workflow that takes you from zero strategy to published, optimized, ranking content in one platform. It's built around the exact system that drove our own growth from 0 to 1.68 million monthly organic impressions and 6,000% visitor growth in 10 months — now productized for every user.

Here's everything that's new.

Strategy Map

This is the big one. Averi now generates a visual content strategy map the moment you onboard — no strategist required.

How it works:

- Averi scrapes your website and learns your brand, products, positioning, and voice automatically
- It generates 5–6 Content Pillars mapped to your ICP's pain points and your business goals
- Each pillar expands through six layers of depth — all generated on demand as you click to explore:

Content Pillars → The core themes your brand needs to own
Focus Areas → Content clusters within each pillar
Research Overview → Trending keywords, top-performing content, and competitive analysis for each focus area
Topics → Thematic groupings ready for execution
Sub-Topics → Individual articles with keyword targets and search intent
Content Outlines → Structured briefs with content type, target audience, strategic angle, and keywords — ready to draft

- Every topic stores ICP metadata: who it's for, what stage of the buyer journey, which pain point it addresses

Why it matters:

Most founders skip strategy because it takes weeks and costs thousands. Averi gives you a research-backed content strategy in minutes — one that's actually connected to your execution pipeline.

You're not staring at a blank page anymore. You're looking at a map of exactly what to create, who it's for, and why it'll rank. The same pillar-based architecture behind Averi's own 1.68M monthly impression growth — now powering your content engine from day one.

Full Content Engine Workflow

Averi v4.0 isn't a writing tool. It's a content engine with six connected phases:

Phase 1: Strategy — Averi scrapes your site, suggests ICPs, analyzes competitors, and builds your content marketing plan. Setup once, optimize forever.

Phase 2: Content Intelligence — Averi researches trends, monitors competitors, analyzes keywords, and surfaces topic recommendations based on real market data. You just approve what gets created.

Phase 3: Execution — Select a topic. Averi deep-researches it (with hyperlinked sources), loads your Brand Core context, applies SEO + GEO structure, and generates a first draft. Then you refine it in the editing canvas with your team.

Phase 4: Publication — One click to publish directly to Webflow, Framer, WordPress & more. Every piece gets stored in your Content Engine to make future content smarter.

Phase 5: Analytics — Built-in performance tracking: impressions, clicks, keyword rankings, trends. Averi doesn't just show data — it tells you what to do about it. "This piece is ranking #8 — here's how to push it to page 1."

Phase 6: Ongoing Automation — Averi runs your engine on autopilot. Weekly cycles queue new topics based on performance data and market trends. You approve. It compounds.

Editing Canvas with AI Assist

Not a text box. A real collaborative editing environment:

- AI Assist: Highlight any section → rewrite, expand, or adjust tone with full brand context
- Internal Linking: Averi automatically suggests and inserts links to your related content
- Meta Generation: Extracts key points, writes meta titles and descriptions automatically

SEO + GEO Optimization (Built In)

Every piece is automatically structured for dual visibility:

- Traditional SEO: Keyword optimization, meta tags, internal links, schema markup
- AI Citations (GEO): FAQ sections, clear entity definitions, authoritative sourced stats, extractable insights designed to get cited by ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Google AI Overviews

You don't need a separate SEO tool. It's built into the workflow.

Content Engine & Brand Core

Your content ecosystem has a memory:

- Brand Core: Your voice, positioning, products, and ICPs — learned during onboarding, applied to everything
- Cumulative Learning: Every published piece feeds back into the system. The more you create, the better it gets.

Content Types

Averi generates across the formats that actually drive growth:

- Blog posts & articles
- How-to guides
- Comparison pages (X vs. Y)
- Listicles
- Editorials & thought leadership

Who This Is For

Averi is built for startups and founders who need content marketing to work — but don't have the time, team, or budget to do it the traditional way:

- Solo founders who can't spend 20 hours/week on marketing
- 1–2 person marketing teams trying to do the work of ten
- Seed to Series A companies ($1M–$10M ARR) who need pipeline, not vanity metrics
- Technical founders who know marketing matters but don't know where to start</div>

            <div class="comment_prefix_body">
                <div class="comment_prefix"><a href="/ai/librida/" class="comment_tool_link object">@Librida</a></div>
                <div class="comment_body" data-clk="">Hi TAAFT!

I'm the founder of Librida.com, and will be happy to answer any questions!

Librida was created with the vision to democratize storytelling, lowering the bar so that anyone can write a book from a simple idea.

While the tool evolved, it has proven to be a fun and creative tool, where you can exchange stories between your friends. Or as a parent to write your own bedtime stories with your children as characters.

Librida is also a social platform, where readers can create their own version of a book as a community edition, and for example change the ending or swap characters.

I'm continously adding features to the platform, so stay tuned for updates!</div>

        <div class="changelog_body" data-clk="">The End of "Endless Negotiations"
We’ve officially killed the friction between brands and creators. This update transforms Twin Tone from a video tool into a fully automated UGC marketplace.

The Creator Link: Creators now have a single "Twin Tone" link for their bios. Brands click the link, enter a script, and generate high-fidelity UGC instantly—no back-and-forth emails required.

Virtual Product Placement: Our AI avatars can now "hold" and interact with physical products, delivering the "premium feel" brands demand without a single camera being turned on.

Zero-Latency Production: What used to take weeks of shipping products and reviewing edits now takes 60 seconds.

Infinite Scalability: Brands can now deploy thousands of diverse creators across any niche (Fashion, Wellness, Tech) simultaneously at a fraction of the cost of one traditional shoot.

Instant Iteration: Want to swap the music or change the tone? Don't book a re-shoot—just click "Generate."

The result? Just content, instantly.</div>

        <div class="changelog_body" data-clk="">Notis is the AI intern one message away from your entire tool stack. Dictate ideas, delegate the busywork, and watch it update everything from your CRM to your socials — right from WhatsApp, iMessage, Telegram, or emails.

- Stronger safety + cost guardrails to keep runs predictable.
- Automations & integrations got more reliable, with better handling of edge cases.</div>

    <div class="version_changelog_first">
        <div class="changelog_header"><a href="/@spanchen/" class="user_card verified s">
    <img loading="lazy" alt="Span Chen profile picture" class="user_profile_picture" src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFCx8AZTFxiti8QKmzGTkep2mMXgcIfxK0ukf8v9RDeZ8=s96-c?width=52">

        <div class="changelog_body" data-clk="">AI Vocal Remover and Music Stem Separation

AirMusic v1.2 focuses on one of the most searched audio tools: an AI Vocal Remover with advanced stem separation.

This update allows you to remove vocals from songs or isolate instrumentals with high accuracy. Whether you want karaoke tracks, remix stems, or clean instrumentals, AirMusic makes it simple.

Our AI analyzes the audio and separates:
- Vocals
- Instrumentals
- Drums
- Bass
- Other stems

This tool is perfect for DJs, remix artists, cover creators, and music producers.

Use cases / Scenarios:
If you want to create karaoke versions, practice singing with instrumentals, remix existing songs, or extract stems for DJ sets and music production, AirMusic replaces complex audio software with a simple online workflow.

Key features:
- Clean vocal removal
- High-quality instrumental extraction
- Fast online processing
- No software installation required</div>

<div class="version_changelog" data-id="2607">
    <div class="version_changelog_first">
        <div class="changelog_header"><a href="/@shubh_saras/" class="user_card verified s">
    <img loading="lazy" alt="Shubh Saras profile picture" class="user_profile_picture" src="https://media.theresanaiforthat.com/u/shubh-saras.png?width=52">
    <div class="column user_data_wrap">
        <div class="user_name">Shubh Saras</div>
    </div>
    
    <div class="relative user_stats">
    <span class="user_ais_count">🛠️ 1<span class="stat_label"> tool</span></span>
    <span class="user_karma">🙏 18<span class="stat_label"> karma</span></span>
     
</div>
</a></div>
        <div class="changelog_body" data-clk="">New Features

🚀 Ace Max Agent

Introducing Ace Max alongside our existing agent versions (Fast and Think) — built for complex reasoning across multi-dimensional tasks. Ace Max handles multi-step workflows that require planning, research, creation, and delivery in a single conversation.

🔌 Connectors

Connectors library with 40+ pre-built connectors including:
- Gmail
- Google Drive
- Notion
- Supabase
- Calendar
- Outlook
- And more...

Key Features:
- Add custom MCP servers as connectors to plug in any tool or API
- Filter tools to limit access to specific actions per session
- Context-efficient design — add as many as you need without worrying about context bloat


🛝 Presenter View for Slides

Professional presentation mode with advanced controls:

- Multi-window setup — presenter view in one window, slide view in another with real-time synchronization
- Interactive cursor tools — laser pointer, arrow, and other cursor types that broadcast across windows
- Presenter notes — AI-generated speaker notes with inline editing, resizable panels, and auto-sync
- Timer controls — built-in timer with pause/reset functionality
- Autoplay mode — configurable auto-advance with adjustable duration
- Slide navigation — thumbnail preview, keyboard shortcuts, and progress tracking
- Publishing — share slides via public URL for remote viewing


📄 File Publishing and Editing

- Publish any file to a public URL — share with anyone, access from anywhere
- Edit files inline in the smart editor with changes synced to the agent in real-time
- Redesigned workspace sidebar with improved file navigation and management

⏮️ Rewind

Rewind any session to any previous message:
- All files, context, and agent state are fully restored to the rewind point
- Branch your session in a new direction from any point in the conversation history

🎤 Audio and Input Experience

- Audio input support — dictate prompts using the microphone
- Prompt enhancement with `Cmd/Ctrl + Shift + E` to refine your prompts before sending
- Quick file picker (`Cmd/Ctrl + U`)
- Drive import (`Cmd/Ctrl + Shift + U`)
- Command palette (`Cmd/Ctrl + K`) for power users

🌐 Web App Previews

- Significantly stabler previews with fixed race conditions, stale content, and server restoration issues
- In-preview navbar to quickly navigate between pages of your app
- Inspect mode — select any element directly on screen and ask the agent to modify it visually
- Cloud integration — connect your Supabase account in a few clicks and build full stack web apps with authentication, database and cloud storage, all managed by the agent.

🧭 Explore and Navigation

- Recent sessions sidebar with quick actions to switch between sessions or start new ones instantly
- Explore section with detailed capability guides to discover everything Raccoon AI can do
- Focused in-session experience with updated tool output UI and performance improvements
- Connect your web app to cloud hosting anytime during a session

🌍 Localization

Raccoon AI now supports 7 languages natively across the entire platform. 

And you can work with the agent in any language including these 7.

Bug Fixes and Stability

- Fixed session listing delays
- Fixed stale file previews
- Fixed missing files
- Fixed delayed UI updates
- Autoloading knowledge bases when tags are present in queries
- Unified and optimized image handling across the agent
- Improved media generation tools and media knowledge bases
- Fixed system prompt propagation for API users</div>
    </div>

<div class="version_changelog" data-id="2504">
    <div class="version_changelog_first">
        <div class="changelog_header">Qwen — v3.5</div>
        <div class="changelog_body" data-clk="">Native multimodal VLM: open-weights release of Qwen3.5-397B-A17B, positioned as a vision-language model with strong reasoning, coding, agent capability, and multimodal understanding.

397B total, 17B active: sparse MoE design activates 17B parameters per forward pass out of 397B, targeting high capability with lower runtime cost.

Hybrid attention for inference efficiency: fuses linear attention (Gated Delta Networks) with sparse MoE to optimize speed and cost without dropping performance.

Massive multilingual expansion: language and dialect coverage increases from 119 to 201, aiming for broader global usability.

Qwen3.5-Plus hosted tier: 1M context by default with built-in tools and adaptive tool use, plus modes like Auto (tool use), Thinking (deep reasoning), Fast (instant) for different latency and cost needs.</div>
    </div>
    <div class="version_changelog_second">
        <div class="changelog_footer">
            <span class="changelog_vote_wrap">
                <span class="changelog_upvote">4</span><span class="changelog_downvote"></span>
            </span>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

        <div class="changelog_body" data-clk="">remio v2.10.0 Early Spring Update! With a limited time 30% discount!

1.📱remio Mobile App is now live on the App Store & Google Play
Capture notes, voice memos, and photos anytime, anywhere—so every spark of inspiration goes straight into your knowledge base. Everything you add or save on your phone will automatically sync to your computer.

2.🍌Nano Banana Image Generation
Unleash your creativity. Generate infographics and design assets directly within your knowledge base using Nano Banana.

3.💬Ask with Chat History Context
Your AI chats are no longer isolated. Reference historical chats in your Q&A for deeper context. Adding to favorites/later & rename are also supported to keep your chats organized.

4.📧Outlook Email Sync
Expand your knowledge net. Sync, search, and chat with your Outlook emails just like you do with Gmail.

5.📈Enhanced Slides Parsing & Preview
Enjoy upgraded parsing accuracy and full visual rendering for all your .pptx presentations.

6.⬆️More experience improvements
Q&A prompt suggestions on the Chat home screen, LaTeX formula rendering, and enhanced multilingual meeting features, plus more.</div>

        <div class="changelog_body" data-clk="">Evalyze now turns 6 months of startup fundraising into 6 weeks. Used by 7,000+ founders from Y Combinator, Techstars, and Antler.

MAJOR PLATFORM UPGRADE

1- 7,000+ Verified Investors Added (12,000+ Total)
Deep intelligence on every investor: active thesis, past deals, check sizes, and direct contact info. 90%+ match accuracy using AI semantic search. Result: 70% higher response rates compared to generic outreach.

2- AI Startup Analyzer 2.0 – Now Trained on 8,000 Real Raises
Get your Investor Readiness Score (350-850) benchmarked against actual funded companies, not theoretical best practices. Analyzes 6 key pillars: Team, Traction, Problem-Solution Fit, Competitive Moat, Market Size, and Unit Economics. Know exactly where you stand before you pitch.

3- AI Pitch Coach Launched – Trained on 50,000 Winning Decks  
Slide-by-slide scoring with specific fixes. Automatic red flag detection for vague financials, weak moats, and poor visual hierarchy. Includes the "30-Second Scan Test" investors actually use and "Toughest Questions to Expect" feature to prep for hard objections.

Coming Next: Full outreach automation with hyper-personalized messaging, one-click sequences, and built-in CRM tracking.</div>

        <div class="changelog_body" data-clk="">AI Workflow & Natural Language Workflow Generation
What is VoooAI?
No coding required. Transform your ideas into professional AI-generated images and videos with just plain English.
Key Pain Points We Solve:
Pain Point Our Solution
❌ Complex workflow editors ✅ Drag-and-drop visual workflow builder - intuitive and beginner-friendly
❌ Hard to switch between AI engines ✅ One-click engine switching - seamlessly switch between Flux1, Seedance Pro, Sora2, and more
❌ Unclear costs before execution ✅ Pre-execution cost estimation - always know your points usage upfront
❌ Don't know which engine to use ✅ Smart AI recommendation - we analyze your needs and suggest the optimal engine
❌ Time-consuming workflow setup ✅ Natural language workflow generation - describe what you want, we build the workflow automatically
Core Features:
🎯 NL2Workflow: Type your idea in plain language, get a complete workflow instantly
🔄 Multi-Engine Support: Access world-leading AI engines for image, video & audio generation
💰 Cost Control: Set your budget limits; choose from Fast, High-Quality, or Economy modes
🧠 Smart Assistant: Intelligent intent recognition + optimized workflow recommendations
Who Is It For?
🎨 Content Creators - Generate professional visuals without technical skills
📺 Video Producers - Create stunning videos with multi-reference image support
🚀 Enterprises - Build automated AI pipelines at scale
Try it now at voooai.com - Your ideas, our AI, infinite possibilities.</div>

            <div class="comment_date_version">
                <div class="comment_date"><a href="https://theresanaiforthat.com/ai/tendem/comment/496070/">Feb 18, 2026</a></div>
                
            </div>
            
            
            <div class="comment_prefix_body">
                <div class="comment_prefix"><a href="/ai/tendem/" class="comment_tool_link object">@Tendem</a></div>
                <div class="comment_body" data-clk="">I work on the Tendem team, so take this with that context — but I also use the product constantly for my own work.

I've used Tendem to research AI directories — finding relevant ones, pulling submission requirements, organizing everything into a spreadsheet I could act on. I've also used it for copy edits — sending over drafts and getting back tightened, polished versions without going back and forth with a prompt ten times.

The thing that keeps me coming back is how little I have to think about the handoff. I describe what I need, send it, and move on to something else. It's slower than getting a ChatGPT response, sure. But I get something finished — not a starting point I still need to rework.

When you use AI tools for this kind of work, you trade waiting time for cleanup time. Tendem flips that. I'd rather wait and get a result I can use than get a fast draft I have to fix myself.</div>
            </div>
            
        </div>

I tried finding a way to email the developer but I couldn't find anything.  Based on the idea I would give this 5stars but in its current state I cant use it.                 <div class="comment_body" data-clk="">B12 exceeded my expectations especially after I tried a few similar tools. I only had to make a few edits, add my bio, and was able to publish that same day. Now I get lots of compliments on my site and I've even tried their other tools like email marketing, which is great because the emails match my site's appearance.
